video.title: STUDY FINDS BETTER QUALITY OF LIFE FOR TERMINALLY ILL PATIENTS WHO REPORTED HAVING END-OF-LIFE DISCU
video.description: Talking about death can be difficult.  But for people with terminal illness, it may be critically important.  A new study finds that people with terminal cancer - who reported having what’s called an “end-of-life discussion” with their doctor - benefited from those conversations.
